function.name: search_similarity
function.description: Search the database for multimedia items (images, videos, audio) most similar to the given query or reference input.

query.description: Text or reference content to find similar items. e.g. photos similar to this mountain sunrise.

top_k.description: Number of most relevant results to return (e.g., 5 for top 5 matches).

function.name: generate_description
function.description: Generate a short, clear English description of the given multimedia content (image, video, or audio).

query.description: Text or reference describing the content to be described. e.g. Describe this image of a busy street at night.

function.name: generate_multimodal_report
function.description: Create a structured English report by combining information from multiple modalities (text, image, video, audio).

query.description: Text describing the topic or content to include in the report. e.g. Summarize the security issues from this CCTV footage and transcript.

function.name: find_object
function.description: Extract keywords from the user's query and search the database for matching videos or images containing the wanted object.

query.description: Free-text user query describing the object to find (e.g., 'find all dogs in the garden')

function.name: count_object
function.description: Extract keywords from the user's query, detect and count the wanted object in selecting videos or images path.

query.description: Free-text user query describing the object to extract wanted keywords for detect and count. (e.g., 'count all dogs in the video -> keyword: dogs').

src.description: A video or image path is selected by the user (e.g., 'video1.mp4').

function.name: object_action_detect
function.description: Extract keywords from the user's query, detect the action of the wanted object in selecting videos or images path.

query.description: Free-text user query describing the object and its action to extract wanted keywords for detecting actions. (e.g., 'find driving man in the video -> keyword: driving').

src.description: A video or image path is selected by the user (e.g., 'video1.mp4').

function.name: transcribe_audio_from_video
function.description: Extract keywords from the user's query, summarize the main content or take a conversation with a specific timing

query.description: User input a free-text that to summarize the selecting's content from the audio or to extract a conversation with the specific timing. (e.g., 'what's the video talk about?', 'give me a conversation from the 2nd minute to the 12th minute.')

src.description: A video or image path is selected by the user (e.g., 'video1.mp4').
